snippet.title: Everholm - Official Trailer | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023 (Freedom Games)
snippet.description: Journey to the colorful world of Everholm in this latest trailer for the upcoming open-ended minimalist RPG. Everholm will be available on PC. Lilly was spirited away to a mysterious island. As her memories fade, everyone seems to know her and her quest for her missing sister. It’s time to establish a homestead, meet your friendly Everfolks, then learn their secrets and solve the mystery of Everholm.
